title: The Promise Ring - The Horse Latitudes (EP)
description:
The Horse Latitudes is a collection of singles and 7" recordings by emo band, The Promise Ring. It was released between their debut album, 30Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â° Everywhere and their hit Nothing Feels Good.

[edit] Track listing

   1. "Watertown Plank" - 3:48
   2. "Mineral Point" - 3:54
   3. "A Picture Postcard" - 3:12
   4. "Saturday" - 2:32
   5. "Scenes From a Parisian Life" - 1:26
   6. "E. Texas Ave." - 2:32
   7. "Miette" - 5:01
   8. "I Never Trusted the Russians" - 2:01


    *
          o tracks 1-2 originally released on the Watertown Plank 7"
          o tracks 3-5 originally released on the Falsetto Keeps Time 7"

          o tracks 7-8 never before released
